description.ko: 우주의 거대한 규모와 침묵하는 힘을 포착하여 무한한 우주에 대한 기념비적인 비전을 제시합니다.
description.en: A monumental vision of the infinite universe, capturing the awe-inspiring scale and silent power of the cosmic void.

prompt: An impossible celestial cathedral formed from gravitational lensing of a supermassive black hole. Pillars of #3D1A78 starlight and #0D0221 dark matter filaments define the infinite hall. Gas clouds of #7B68EE and #E6E6FA swirl in the background. Cinematic 8k scale, volumetric gas simulations, the silent majesty of the cosmic abyss.
